headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Podium Vehicle: Enus Stafford and More
content:
Stop by the lobby at The Diamond Casino & Resort to give the Lucky Wheel its free daily spin for the opportunity to win GTA$, RP, clothing and more. This week's top prize is the Enus Stafford, a mobster classic -- three-piece suit not included.

If you've missed out on any of the exclusive offerings in the Casino Store, stop by this week to pick up limited-time pieces and accessories like the Bigness Rage Bomber, SC Broker Logo Hoodie or merch designed by Epsilon's own Sebastian Dix and more.
